import React, {Component} from 'react'; import {Grid, Cell, List, ListItem, ListItemContent} from 'react-mdl'; /*import { Button } from 'reactstrap';*/ import styled, { keyframes } from 'styled-components'; import { bounceIn } from 'react-animations'; const Bounce = styled.div`animation: 2s ${keyframes `${bounceIn}`} `; class About extends Component { render (){ return (

About

{/* */}

I am Tanuka Das, a Software Developer, based in New York City. I focus on implementing an intricate and detailed code. My fascination in coding began by adding computer science courses to my undergraduate studies and grew with developing and building web applications. Making a project go from a concept to life simultaneously challenges, intrigues and motivates me. Apart from coding I write technical blogs on medium.
When I am not working, I love spending time with my family, reading books, hiking, exploring new places, and enjoy yummy desserts.

{/* LinkedIn */} {/* GitHub */} {/* blogging website --> https://medium.com/@tanuka-das12 */} {/* Gmail */}

Community

Ladies Get Paid LEAGUE OF WOMEN CODERS

Interest: full-time, part-time, freelancing

Download Resume Hire Me
© Tanuka Das. All rights reserved.
) } } export default About;
